 2017-15702017-12-14ESDC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Mortgage and Housing Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Employment and Social Development of ANNE GIARDINI, O.C., Q.C., of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term of four years, effective January 2, 2018.
